title: #217: The Case of Jennifer Levin: "The Preppy Murder" Part 3
description:
Laura and Jim discuss their analysis and thoughts with Lisa about Jennifer's murder in Central Park on August 26 1986. 


Laura draws parallels with several other high profile cases and we debate motive against the backdrop of the five part AMC and Sundance docuseries "The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park."


#HerNameWasJenniferLevin

#HerNameWasNatalieConnolly

#HerNameWasGraceMillane

#VictimsMatter

#PreppyMurder

#MaleViolence


You can watch 'The Preppy Murder: Death in Central Park' about Jennifer Levin's case on AMC and Sundance

https://www.amc.com/shows/the-preppy-murder-death-in-central-park
